list.title: Agencies List
list.description: Below is a list with general aspects of the agencies.

delete.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this agency?
delete.confirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. The agency will be permanently deleted from the database, please verify this action before proceeding.

toggleState.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to change the state of this agency?
toggleState.activateDescription: This action will activate the agency in the database, its users will be able to use their credentials and use the platform.
toggleState.deactivateDescription: This action will deactivate the agency in the database, its users will not be able to use their credentials and use the platform.

agencyCreate.title: Create Agency
agencyCreate.description: Window to create an agency, add all the information to continue.
agencyCreate.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to create this agency?
agencyCreate.confirmDescription: Once the agency is created, you will be able to create roles to use within it.
agencyCreate.imageUploadError: There was an error uploading the image. Please try again later.

agencyEdit.title: Edit Agency
agencyEdit.description: Window to edit an agency, add all the information to continue.
agencyEdit.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to edit this agency?
agencyEdit.confirmDescription: Once the agency is updated, you will be able to create roles to use within it.
agencyEdit.imageUploadError: There was an error uploading the image. Please try again later.

agencyShow.title: Agency Information
agencyShow.description: In this window you can view all the information related to the agency.

error.title: Uh oh! Something went wrong.
error.serverConnection: Could not connect to server. Please try again later.
